text: with its IPO this week Twitter will be
valued at roughly 14 billion dollars
here are some risk factors twitter says

should be fully aware of there are 35
pages of them the bottom line is that
Twitter's can have trouble living up to
its 14 billion dollar plus valuation
unless it can make money from
advertising and that is a tricky balance
celebs and journalists tweet but Twitter
needs more than folks like me to sign up
if everyone tweets ad dollars could rise
maybe at the same time twitter has
vastly increased the volume of ads
online that could be a smart strategy or
the flood of ads could turn people off
the third thing is that there's a
mismatch between where Twitter's users
are and where it's ad dollars come from
three-quarters of Twitter's users are
outside the United States but they
account for only about a quarter of its
ad dollars Twitter's s1 lays out in no
uncertain terms the company is not

while it's invested a lot in rd it's yet

considering buying the stock take
